1. City Council

City Council
============

![City Council Group photo May 2024](https://cityofkilgore.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=3546)

City Council is comprised of a Mayor and 4 City Council members. Â Members of City Council serve a two-year term, with elections conducted every year, allowing for staggered terms. Together they constitute the legislative body of the City. The City of Kilgore operates under the Council-Manager form of government. The current City Council Members are Mayor Ronnie Spradlin, Mayor Pro Tem Victor Boyd, Council Place 1 Randy Renshaw, Council Place 2, Alan VanDoren, and Council Place 3, Daniel Gantt.

City Council Meetings are generally held every 2nd and 4th Tuesday of the month at 5:30 p.m. at Kilgore City Hall at 815 N. Kilgore St. Special meetings or work sessions may be called as needed. The Annual Meeting Calendar can be found in the
[City Meeting Calendar section.](https://cityofkilgore.civicweb.net/Portal/MeetingSchedule.aspx)
